titles.title: A bill to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of an entry of certain manufacturing equipment entered on February 9, 2002.
A bill to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of an entry of certain manufacturing equipment entered on February 9, 2002.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Provides for the liquidation or reliquidation of entries of certain manufacturing equipment.
